name: Forgotten Lands (Fan22)
description:
*Disclaimer: this game its still in progress, it doesnt have and ending, bosses and more areas yet keep that on mind..

Forgotten Lands it's a game about exploring ancient lands that once where full of life, but now, they are just a vessel full of corruption, monsters and unexplainable things.

Talk with people and strange creatures meanwhile you go forward and discover the secrets of this place..

-Controls:

Movement: W A S D

Atack: Left, Up, Right and Down keys

Interact with objects: E

Talk with characters: Space
